title: Coupa shares jump 11% on Q2 results
text: Coupa Software Inc. COUP, -3.26% shares jumped 11% in the extended session Tuesday after the cloud company reported second-quarter results that exceeded Wall Street estimates. Coupa reported non-GAAP earnings of 7 cents a share. Revenue soared 54% to $95.1 million. Analysts surveyed by FactSet had expected a loss of 10 cents a share on revenue of $85.4 million. The company raised the revenue forecast for its current fiscal 2020 year to between $369 million and $372 million, up from $342 million to $344 million. Coupa shares are up 114% this year. The S&P 500 index SPX, -0.69% has gained 17% this year.
description: Coupa Software Inc. shares jumped 11% in the extended session Tuesday after the cloud company reported second-quarter results that exceeded Wall Street...
